text: Ama korosuk Qaadaa kee taama firqawnaa kee kay maraay keenik duma warreeh sinni Rabbih astooti dirabboyse mari luk suge Qaadaa kee taamoomih inna, tokkel usun aben dambittÃª sabbatah ken fingisneeh firqawnaa kee kay mara Badat xuumusneeh bayisne, usun inkih sinni nafsi koroosannuu kee uma taamoomit yudlume marah sugen
